description:
Umi is the only child of a rich family and goes to a school for "privileged" girls.
She is quick-tempered and at first uncaring and selfish, though perhaps the best-suited for the task at hand, but is also the most reluctant. As Magic Knight Rayearth progresses, she starts to care for other people and better understand the Magic Knights` situation. Perhaps this is because she is a "privileged" girl.
Interestingly enough Umi is the first Magic Knight to revive her Guardian.
She is the Magic Knight of Water and her name translates to "Sea Dragon Blossom".
name: Ryuuzaki Umi
